description:
Natsusa starts his dorm life with Yasunari as his roommate. Yasunari seems to hate him, which severely affects Natsusa`s mood. This time, their match is against Isui University, where the rugby team has completely changed from the previous year.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Can`t Win Against a Person Who Enjoys Everything So Seriously.
Nanigotomo Shinken ni Tanoshinderu Hito ni wa Kanawanai
何事も真剣に楽しんでる人には敵わない
